title: A Li+-flux-homogenizing separator for long-term cycling of Li metal anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4078-4089
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00115J, Paper
Yuanpeng Ji, Liwei Dong, Jipeng Liu, Haodong Xie, Shijie Zhong, Chunhui Yang, Jiecai Han, Weidong He
A facilely prepared PVDF-HFP/SN separator homogenizes the Li+ flux through the formation of SN⋯PF6−⋯Li+ structures between the SN agent and the electrolyte, resulting in even Li deposition and stable performances of Li metal batteries.
